critique:
The document is a formal declaration regarding tungsten ore procurement and its use for defense production. It invokes a national emergency and directs the Treasury Department to make the ore available for defense purposes. The language is formal and legalistic. There is a sense of urgency due to the declared shortage and national emergency.
